content: Calculate the equivalent distance in miles by using the conversion rate of kilometers to miles for the given distance of 45 kilometers.

To convert kilometers to miles, you can use the conversion factor where 1 kilometer is approximately equal to 0.621371 miles. 

For 45 kilometers, the equivalent distance in miles would be:

\[ 45 \text{ km} \times 0.621371 \text{ miles/km} = 27.961695 \text{ miles} \]

So, 45 kilometers is approximately 27.96 miles.
